name: YChan - 4chan and 8chan image downloader
summary: YChan is a program to download images from 8chan / 8ch and 4chan
short_description:
YChan is a free image downloader. It supports multithreading and auto-rechecking of threads. It was created as an alternative for XChan which doesnt work anymore.
Supported Websites: 8chan.co / 8ch.net and 4chan.org
YChan requieres .NET Framework 4.5 or higher.

Thanks to everyone who isnt to jewish to gift me something on Steam (See the "About" Menu in the program)

Dev Status:
Noticed some minor bugs when saving a thread as html because 4chan changed it's code, but I'm fixing it atm. rebuilding some background stuff to implement a progress indicator. redoing the settings panel to look more structed and adding more options.
Going to make the plugin-api more powerfull and add some other boards.

If you've discovered bugs or if you want to suggest a new feature CREATE A TICKET. PLEASE! It's easier to respond to suggestions / bug reports this way.
